issue.title: [R] [CI] Upstream clang sanitizer to rhub
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14617](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14617). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11577 we added a clang sanitizer. We should upstream the ci/docker/r-fedora-clang-devel-san dockerfile to [rhub's builders](https://github.com/r-hub/rhub-linux-builders) and replace our references to it.
